keyval.val: Pre-validation study for prostate markers hk2, hk4 and hk11. Three markers (hk2, hk4 and hk11) were tested among 123 samples (60 controls/ 63 cases). Among the cases, 33 had low Gleason grade (less than 7) and 30 had high Gleason grade (greather than or equal to 7). Three samples (cases) were missing due to QNS. 116 observations had PSA measured.
Marker performance summary for prostate pre-validation study (Diamandis lab)
Marker performance summary for hk2, hk4 and hk11, including ROC curves, box plots and distribution plots.

Three markers (hk2, hk4 and hk11) were measured among 123 samples (60 controls, 63 cases). Among the cases, 33 had low Gleason grade (less than 7) and 30 had high Gleason grade (greater than or equal to 7).
In evaluating the performance of 163 markers, 3 samples (case) were missing due to QNS. 116 observations had PSA measured.
